LanguageData.EnergyTrackerUnderBarFactorDesc_ISF: A multiplier on recovery rate when the current energy level is below 0.
LanguageData.EnergyTrackerOverBarFactorDesc_ISF: A multiplier on recovery rate when the current energy level is above the maximum energy.
LanguageData.EnergyStatDesc_ISF: The resource that pawns require to cast sorceries, upon which it is depleted (or in rare cases, gained).
LanguageData.EnergyTrackerTurnInfoDesc_ISF: The amount of time a "turn" (the period of time between automatic game pauses when the pawn is drafted) takes in seconds.
LanguageData.EnergyTrackerRefreshInfoDesc_ISF: The amount of time it takes a sorcery schema to refresh various values, often discrete casts, in seconds.
LanguageData.EnergyTrackerAmmoDesc_ISF: The source(s) of this schema's energy unit. Depending on schema, various sources can contribute differing amounts of energy units.
